name: Icarus: A Space Revolution
description: Icarus: A Space Revolution, is a Graphic Adventure about a riot in a spaceship made by 4 classmates (Jorge Rodriguez, David Calvo, Marío García y Antón Viejo) and Álvaro Barrientos "GLoDas" in almost 5 months. All the art (with exception of the UI) was made by Álvaro Barrientos "GLoDas", and the design was made by the 5 of us. (The texts are only in spanish, sorry about that)
